title: Sri Lanka : Harin, Manusha & Tiran among 9 new Cabinet Ministers appointed
body_lines: COLOMB0 (News 1st); Sri Lanka appointed 9 new Cabinet Ministers of Friday (20).
1. Nimal Siripala De Silva – Ports, Naval and Aviation Services
Sri Lanka : Harin, Manusha & Tiran among 9 new Cabinet Ministers appointed
